translations: 不合格；取消资格；被罚下场

sentences.sentence: Any form of cheating means automatic disqualification.
sentences.translation: 任何形式的作弊都意味着自动取消资格。

sentences.sentence: Livingston faces a four-year disqualification from athletics.
sentences.translation: 利文斯顿面临着为期4年的体育禁赛。

sentences.sentence: Which of the following will result in disqualification?
sentences.translation: 下列哪项会导致取消资格？
